title: Mary Tavy Inn Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pub/restaurant/inn has separate vegetarian menu, one dish is labeled vegan and possibly the bean chili is vegan (please ask staff). Also you can pick your pizza toppings, of which some are vegan. Located within Dartmoor National Park. No fee is required to enter Dartmoor National Park.
